gmd:fileIdentifier.gco:CharacterString: Northeastern Regional Association of Coastal Ocean Observing Systems

gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata Part 2 Extensions for imagery and gridded data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Northeastern Regional Association of Coastal Ocean Observing Systems
NetCDF Climate Forecast Metadata Convention Standard Names

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: NetCDF Climate and Forecast (CF) Metadata Convention Standard Names Committee

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Description of the CF Standard Names

srv:description.gco:CharacterString: Allowed values: 44022, 44039, 44040, 44060, 44098, A01, ALL_PLATFORMS, B01, CDIP154, CDIP176, CML, CO2, D02, E01, E02, F01, F02, GREAT_BAY, I01, LDLC3, M01, MDS02, N01, SMB-MO-01, SMB-MO-04, SMB-MO-05

Allowed values: Ed_PAR, air_temperature, chlorophyll, direction_of_sea_water_velocity, dissolved_oxygen, dominant_wave_period, oxygen_saturation, percent_oxygen_saturation, sea_level_pressure, sea_water_density, sea_water_electrical_conductivity, sea_water_salinity, sea_water_speed, sea_water_temperature, significant_height_of_wind_and_swell_waves, surface_partial_pressure_of_carbon_dioxide_in_air, surface_partial_pressure_of_carbon_dioxide_in_sea_water, turbidity, visibility_in_air, wind_from_direction, wind_gust, wind_speed

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: This record was translated from SOS Capabilities using SOS2ISO_MI.xsl Version 2012-09-05
